name: CoBots
description:
What is the meaning of life? For these little robots it has always been to solve the problems their creator built for them. Their creator is however long gone, and is not providing them any problems to solve. What do they do then? They created their own problems in the form of puzzles! Use your wits to overcome these puzzles and help the robots find meaning in their lives once again!

Key Features

SINGLE PLAYER CO-OP
All your actions are recorded, making it possible for you to go back in time and cooperate with your previous attempts! For example, use the different robots to open doors, deactivate lasers, or sacrifice them for each other, all to reach the goal!



DIFFERENT ZONES
Enter two zones with different gameplay and environments! Have a nice sunny day by the lake, or challenge yourself in the robot factory!

PUZZLE THEMES
Expand on the way you solve puzzles by understanding the different themes surrounding them. In the end you'll be able to use all that you've learned to conquer all the levels!

OBSTACLES & MECHANICS
Overcome the different challenges that you meet! Dangerous lasers, crushing walls, various spinning things, high-speed conveyor belts, uncooperative doors, distracting fish, and more!

COLLECT ALL CHIPS
Each level has microchips used for unlocking new levels. Go for the bare minimum, or challenge yourself by collecting them all!
